resourceTemplates.name: Current time by timezone
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the current time for a specified timezone (e.g., Europe/Amsterdam, America/New_York, Etc/UTC).

resourceTemplates.name: Current time by area/location
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the current time for a specified area and location (e.g., area=Europe, location=Amsterdam).

resourceTemplates.name: Current time by area/location/region
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the current time for a timezone with three segments (e.g., America/Argentina/Buenos_Aires).
